# cook your dish here
t=int(input())
for i in range(t):
    h=list(reversed(list(input())))
    v="ABCDEF"
    r=[10,11,12,13,14,15] 
    x=0
    for j in range(len(h)):   
      if h[j] not in v:
          x=x+(int(h[j])*(16**j))
      else:
          y=r[v.index(h[j])]
          x=x+(int(y)*(16**j))
   
    print(x)
